sentences.sContent: For a dollar stake, you can win up to $1,000,000.
sentences.sCn: 押一美元赌注，最多可赢一百万美元。

sentences.sContent: ...And the fact that they have a personal stake in the outcome makes them really pay attention...
...the opponents assume that they would not stake their money on such a risky investment which does not guarantee a promising career...
...we all have a common stake in our school...

synos.tran: 资助，支持；系…于桩上；把…押下打赌

phrases.pCn: 危如累卵；处于危险中；在紧要关头
为某人取得某物而提供金钱(或援助)，资助某人取得某物
监视；立桩标出；派警察监视
在...上打赌；把赌注押在...上面

remMethod.val: s ＋ take(带来) → 带来赌金 → 赌金

trans.tranOther: money that you risk as the result of a horse race, card game etc
